attributes.action: terrence anthon to introduce cumpulsory voting so that a government may be formed based on a full representation of the public and not less than 25 percent as it is now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this government is not representative of the country as only 63% of the country voted and 36% of 63% is less than 25% of the voting public so this government is not representative of the counrtys wishes.the introduction of compulsory voting would mean that the elected body would be nearer a true representation of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
